properties.name: server.extra-http-port
properties.description: 增加一个接受HTTP连接的端口，用于同时支持HTTP和HTTPS.

properties.name: kaciras.development。http-delay
properties.description: 增加请求处理的延迟，可用于测试.

properties.name: kaciras.authorization.csrf-cookie
properties.description: 在Cookie中存储CSRF Token，如果为null则不启用CSRF检查.

properties.name: kaciras.authorization.csrf-header
properties.description: 鉴定用户身份时要求检查该请求头的值与CSRF Cookie的值相等.

properties.name: kaciras.authorization.csrf-parameter
properties.description: 鉴定用户身份时要求检查该请求参数的值与CSRF Cookie的值相等.

properties.name: kaciras.authorization.skip-safe
properties.description: 在处理HTTP安全请求时不做CSRF相关的检查.

properties.name: kaciras.authorization.adminPrincipal
properties.description: 所有用户的身份都设为管理员，在调试时有用.
